backgrounds.name: Barbarian
backgrounds.description: From a savage world of low technology and high violence

backgrounds.name: Clergy
backgrounds.description: Religious professional, priest, monk, or spiritual leader

backgrounds.name: Courtesan
backgrounds.description: Companion, entertainer, or professional of proffered pleasure

backgrounds.name: Criminal
backgrounds.description: Thief, smuggler, spy, or other lawbreaker

backgrounds.name: Dilettante
backgrounds.description: Wealthy socialite who never needed a real profession

backgrounds.name: Entertainer
backgrounds.description: Singer, dancer, actor, poet, or professional artist

backgrounds.name: Merchant
backgrounds.description: Trader, shopkeeper, or daring far trader

backgrounds.name: Noble
backgrounds.description: Member of a planetary ruling class or aristocracy

backgrounds.name: Official
backgrounds.description: Bureaucrat, government clerk, or law enforcement

backgrounds.name: Peasant
backgrounds.description: Farmer, agricultural worker, or rural laborer

backgrounds.name: Physician
backgrounds.description: Doctor, medic, healer, or medical professional

backgrounds.name: Pilot
backgrounds.description: Spacecraft, vehicle, or transport operator

backgrounds.name: Politician
backgrounds.description: Elected official, political operative, or public figure

backgrounds.name: Scholar
backgrounds.description: Scientist, sage, professor, or dedicated researcher

backgrounds.name: Soldier
backgrounds.description: Professional fighter, military veteran, or warrior

backgrounds.name: Spacer
backgrounds.description: Voidborn worker who lives and works in space

backgrounds.name: Technician
backgrounds.description: Builder, engineer, mechanic, or technical specialist

backgrounds.name: Thug
backgrounds.description: Enforcer, gangster, bruiser, or strong-arm

backgrounds.name: Vagabond
backgrounds.description: Wanderer, drifter, or person of the road

backgrounds.name: Worker
backgrounds.description: Factory laborer, industrial worker, or service employee

backgrounds.name: Arcanist Scholar
backgrounds.description: Bookish wizard dedicated to magical scholarship

backgrounds.name: Hirespell
backgrounds.description: Mercenary wizard who hires out their magical talents

backgrounds.name: Government Mage
backgrounds.description: Arcanist in the employ of a government or civil authority

backgrounds.name: Arcane Muse
backgrounds.description: Hired experience provider capable of granting impossible encounters

backgrounds.name: Escaped Familiar
backgrounds.description: Former property who escaped their master's control

backgrounds.name: Occult Proxy
backgrounds.description: Professional helper who goes to dangerous places for employers

backgrounds.name: Godhunter Inquisitor
backgrounds.description: Trained in sniffing out Shadow cults and their abominable heresy

backgrounds.name: Godhunter Templar
backgrounds.description: Consecrated to war against Shadows seeking theological foothold

backgrounds.name: Vengeful Renegade
backgrounds.description: Former cult member or victim using knowledge as weapon against cults

backgrounds.name: Pacter Chosen
backgrounds.description: Received powers through non-traditional means rather than formal training

backgrounds.name: Pacter Controller
backgrounds.description: Specializes in summoning and controlling Shadows for your own ends

backgrounds.name: Pacter Dragoman
backgrounds.description: Diplomat and interpreter specializing in negotiating with Shadows

backgrounds.name: Amender of Flesh
backgrounds.description: Healer who corrects deformities and alters bodily forms

backgrounds.name: Identity Artist
backgrounds.description: Seeks enlightenment through changing physical form and societal role

backgrounds.name: Vessel of Will
backgrounds.description: Uses arcane arts to hone body as tool for untrammeled will

backgrounds.name: Sunblade Mystic
backgrounds.description: Spiritual guide embracing mysteries and seeking peaceful resolution

backgrounds.name: Sunblade Warrior
backgrounds.description: Warrior consecrated to the sword, trained in ancient martial arts

backgrounds.name: Sunblade Burnout
backgrounds.description: Former member who departed the order, living on society's edge

backgrounds.name: War Mage Veteran
backgrounds.description: Combat veteran who served on the front lines with magical abilities

backgrounds.name: War Mage Officer
backgrounds.description: Former military leader who coordinated soldiers in battle

backgrounds.name: War Mage Rebel
backgrounds.description: Independent War Mage outside standing military forces

backgrounds.name: Accountant of Life and Death
backgrounds.description: Investigator and judge trained in discernment and adjudication

backgrounds.name: Celestial Loss Preventer
backgrounds.description: Diplomat and negotiator salvaging bad situations

backgrounds.name: Devil's Incense
backgrounds.description: Infiltrator trained in social assassination and execution
